name: Dynamic War
description:
It is full of action, combat fps game. Your world is defenseless by terrorists who sneaked into cites and make hustle gang chaos. You are given challenge as a commando, accept the mission. Destroy all terrorist fighters who are hiding. You need to use your fantastic fps shooting games skills and combat shooting heroes capability, survive the battlefield and complete the fps survival games mission. The terrorists trying to occupy the city. You have to accept the mission, to destroy the terrorists attack base in the cit. Kill all the gangsters & terrorist take down to restore peace of the world. Show your superb shooting skills in fps games, complete the all-out combat missions of survival games and become a hero. Enjoy this game to bring the escape revenge shooting gang killer experience so that you can ease stress. Each mission requires a unique tactic of encountering a terrorist but always has the same result in Dynamic War. 

Dynamic War is a secret war going behind the world. Your job , is to secretly destroy the terrorist takedown gangs and restore peace, law and order to the world. Don't make the fault of under estimating these terrorists because they are well trained too. Go ahead, and save the world from chaos and play the most realistic game. And win this Dynamic War.
